channel.title: The 200 Word RPG Challenge Begins October 2nd
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
This year's schedule has been posted, as well as our panel of excellent judges!
https://200wordrpg.github.io/
This small tabletop game design challenge encourages **everyone** to make a complete role-playing game. It’s hard to work on a game, and much harder to finish one. This is an opportunity for participants to brainstorm, write, edit, playtest, and polish a game idea from start to finish.
I hope you'll be able to participate this year, get some feedback on your entries, and maybe even win some cool prizes!
Let me know if you have any questions.

item.title: The 200 Word RPG Challenge Begins October 2nd
item.dc:creator: @David_Schirduan
item.description:
@David_Schirduan wrote:

Hello everyone!

This year’s schedule has been posted, as well as our panel of excellent judges!

200wordrpg.github.io

200 Word RPG Challenge

A small but difficult game design contest. What can you do with 200 words?

This small tabletop game design challenge encourages everyone to make a complete role-playing game. It’s hard to work on a game, and much harder to finish one. This is an opportunity for participants to brainstorm, write, edit, playtest, and polish a game idea from start to finish.

I hope you’ll be able to participate this year, get some feedback on your entries, and maybe even win some cool prizes!

Let me know if you have any questions.

Read full topic
item.source: The 200 Word RPG Challenge Begins October 2nd
